reviews.review: My favorite Bioshock game.  Twists and turns, interesting plot, nostalgia from the first games...it's all there.
it's a good game overall, not the most in depth or the longest, but rich story and environment.

Maravilloso shooter, lo juguÃ© en la Play 3 cuando la tenia y lo volvi a comprar para poder jugarlo nuevamente. No he probado los DLCs pero el juego base esta de maravilla, aunque no tiene mucha rejugabilidad como Tomb raider o Uncharted, la primera run de esta clase de juegos nunca se olvida. 11/10

This game is a must play for any RPG and fantasy steampunk fan. The worlds, voice acting, and immersion techniques used in this game are stunning, and you won't be disappointed. You will get your money's worth 100x over with this purchase :)!
gran juego y bien optimizado a pesar de aÃ±os este juego me sigue sorprendiendo

As much as i love the original Bioshock i have to say that i prefer this game, the colorful and breathtaking world draws you in almost instantly and the wide open space offer an amazing contrast to the compact compartments of Rapture. Not an overall improvement to the first game but one i'm proud to say deserves the same recognition as it.

I had heard great things about Infinite which led to very high ecpectations and was afraid to play it, in fact i had it in my library for 3 years before I got the courage to play it. It was nothing like what I expected. That said the game is far better than i ever imagined. It's a fantastic blend of story and gunplay with a fantastic soundtrack and mind bending events. Just get it. âˆ/10

One of my favorite games of this decade.
10/10
Ok, this game is fantasic! The ENDING! Definitely a game you'll want to pick up.
Sehr schickes Spiel in einem tollen Setting.
i love this game so much

This game is one of my favourites. I love the steampunk universe of Bioshock and the art is just beautiful. I highly recommend you get it, even if you're not into FPS games (I sure wasn't).

And if you like all the sci-fi stuff you'd love this game.

Beautiful game, shocker ending that made me stare at my computer screen for a good minute.

De los mejores juegos que he jugado en mi vida.
Se puede empezar este juego sin haber jugado los anteriores pero para jugar los 2 DLCs si es necesarios haber jugado el Bioshock 1 y 2, lo cual vale la pena puesto que los 2 DLCs, a mi parecer, son mejores que la historia principal la cual de por si es buenisima.

All you need to know is that it's a wonderful game. I went in blind (with nothing but playing the first and second Bioshock) and let me tell you, it was an amazing experience. 11/10. Alot of people say that this isn't as good as the first and second, but I honestly perfer this one over them all. Have fun playing!

Good graphics and environments. Storyline is very confusing if this is the first bioshock game that you are about to play. Save money and buy a pack to get all games or all dlc's so you won't have to buy the season pass seperatly.
un juego que me hiso pensar que era de rescatar al personaje femenino y listo se acabo, pero este es muy dferente, la verdad pruebalo.

Perfection

Just buy it you cheap ass.
Simply a master piece, although some people hate the close it gives the trilogy, still a great game.
Great story, great environment, ok game mechanics vs previous games (but still great).

One of the best games in history, plot is insane, and second round in the game is just even funnier.

IncreÃ­ble juego, una banda sonora preciosa y bastante en tono en muchas escenas, una jugabilidad frenÃ©tica y divertida, unos grÃ¡ficos que sin ser hyper realistas, apelan por un tono mas Ãºnico y distintivo que lo hacen ver realmente hermoso, la historia es definitivamente la base de lo que hace a este juego una pieza maestra, las interacciones entre el protagonista y Elizabeth tienen tanta quÃ­mica, sin olvidar que ella es de hecho de gran utilidad en el gameplay, el final simplemente te vuela la cabeza, y todo lo que se expande a los 2 dlc es otra fumada increÃ­ble que te deja totalmente loco.

10/10 es una experiencia inolvidable.
Tremendo juegazo, la ambientacion y la historia hacen que te atrape el juego de una manera buenisima.
